TopicTitle: (BDAc) Strangest things to happen with AI control

Articles.Content:
Topic title.  Sometimes I like to mess around with BDA and plane designs and pit one design against another design, but sometimes I get...odd results.

For instance, I made a Star Wars inspired fighter, and all they want to do as soon as competition starts is fly up to 20k+ to fight, and I usually use the minimum altitudes.  weird...

Buoyancy. Its a common problem in aeroplanes.
